statements: SELECT * FROM library_inventory ORDER BY book_title ASC;
SELECT book_title, author FROM Library_inventory WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM library_inventory ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) FROM library_inventory GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE availability = true;
SELECT book_title, author FROM library_inventory WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, book_title, publication_date FROM library_inventory WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT COUNT(book_id) AS total_books, availability FROM library_inventory GROUP BY availability;
SELECT * FROM library_inventory
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM library_inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_date FROM loan_transactions
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions WHERE return_date IS NULL
SELECT borrower_name, loan_date, return_date FROM loan_transactions ORDER BY loan_date DESC
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY book_title ASC
SELECT book_id, book_title, author_name FROM library_inventory WHERE author_name = 'J.K. Rowling'
SELECT * FROM library_inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC, book_title ASC
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM library_inventory ORDER BY author_name ASC
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_date FROM loan_transactions WHERE return_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Books;
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE category='Fiction';
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM Books ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT * FROM Loans JOIN Users ON Loans.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT book_id, title, published_date FROM Books WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE category='Fiction';
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE published_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, address FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT book_id, title, author, published_date FROM Books WHERE author='J.K. Rowling' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT l.loan_id, u.name AS user_name, b.title AS book_title, l.loan_date FROM Loans l JOIN Users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id JOIN Books b ON l.book_id = b.book_id ORDER BY l.loan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre='Science Fiction';
SELECT title, author, year_published FROM books ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM members WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre='Fiction' ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE year_published BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books B INNER JOIN loans L ON B.book_id = L.book_id WHERE L.return_date IS NULL;
SELECT library_id, name, location, librarian_name FROM libraries ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM library_books;
SELECT title, author FROM library_books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT * FROM library_patrons ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT book_id, title, author, published_year FROM library_books WHERE published_year > 2010;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM library_books;
SELECT * FROM library_books ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author FROM library_books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY published_year ASC;
SELECT title, author, published_year FROM library_books WHERE author LIKE '%Doe%' AND genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT * FROM library_books INNER JOIN library_staff ON library_books.author = library_staff.name WHERE library_books.published_year > 2000;
SELECT title, author, COUNT(book_id) as total_books FROM library_books GROUP BY author HAVING total_books > 1 ORDER BY total_books DESC;
